required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Transplantation of Frozen Thawed Ovarian Tissue High Reproductive Performance
clinical_study.official_title: Transplantation of Frozen Thawed Ovarian Tissue Demonstrates High Reproductive Performance and the Need to Revise Restrictive Criteria

brief_summary.textblock:
Design: prospective cohort study. Setting: Tertiary university-affiliated ART and oncology centers. Patients: 20 cancer survivors who underwent ovarian transplantation of frozen-thawed ovarian tissue, with the aim to conceive.
Interventions: Ovarian tissue cryopreservation (OTCP) and transplantation, endocrine monitoring, IVF.

detailed_description.textblock:
Main Outcomes expected:
Endocrine profile IVF results, pregnancy rates following transplantation of ovarian tissue live-births rates following transplantation of ovarian tissue cancer disease recurrence

primary_outcome.description: recurrence of menstrual bleeding- yes or no

primary_outcome.measure: number of oocytes per IVF cycle
primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion (up to 11 years following transplantation)
primary_outcome.description: number of aspirated oovytes per one IVF cycle performed

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion (up to 11 years following transplantation)
primary_outcome.description: spontaneous or post IVF pregnancy rates (%)

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion (up to 11 years following transplantation)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion (7 months to 141 months following transplantation)

other_outcome.description: as part of the endocrine profile
as part of the endocrine profile

other_outcome.measure: number of embryos per IVF cycle
other_outcome.time_frame: through study completion (up to 11 years following transplantation)
through study completion (up to 11 years following transplantation)
other_outcome.description: number of pregnancies obtained via IVF devided by number of IVF cycles

arm_group.description: infertile cancer survivors who seek to conceive and had frozen ovarian tissue when diagnosed years before

intervention.description: operation(mini laparotomy) for transplantation of frozen- thawed ovarian tissue

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria: infertile patients who stored ovarian tissue to preserve fertility prior to potentially sterilizing cancer treatments
Exclusion Criteria:
- active disease, fertile patients post cancer treatment
